dashboard.infos: This is your dashboard overview. Below you can see some statistics about our application.

games.error: Please fill out all fields in the Game Details section
games.descriptioncreate: Create a new game and challenge opponents
games.descriptionedit: Edit a new game and challenge opponents
games.infodescription: All Match informations are displayed here

sports.error: Please enter a name for the sport.
sports.name: Sport Name

login.failed: These credentials do not match our records.

confirmPassword.text: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

forgotPassword.text: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

verifyEmail.link: Before continuing, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verifyEmail.newLink: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.

updateProfile.title: Profile Information
updateProfile.description: Update your account's profile information and email address.
updateProfile.resentLink: Click here to re-send the verification email.
updateProfile.alertResend: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.

updatePassword.title: Update Password
updatePassword.description: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add additional security to your account using two factor authentication.
twoFactorAuth.enabled: You have enabled two factor authentication.
twoFactorAuth.notEnabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
twoFactorAuth.textEnabled: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
twoFactorAuth.finishEnabling: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
twoFactorAuth.nowEnable: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key.
twoFactorAuth.recoveryCodes: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.

logoutOtherBrowser.title: Browser Sessions
logoutOtherBrowser.description: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
logoutOtherBrowser.text: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
logoutOtherBrowser.confirmPw: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.

deleteUser.title: Delete Account
deleteUser.text: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
deleteUser.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

team.title: Team informations
team.name: Team name
team.nameDesc: The team's name and owner information.
team.text: Once a team is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting this team, please download any data or information regarding this team that you wish to retain.
team.sure: Are you sure you want to delete this team? Once a team is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
team.createdesc: Create a new team to collaborate with others on sports activities.
team.descTeamMember: Add a new team member to your team, allowing them to share sport activities with you.
team.addEmail: Please provide the email address of the person you would like to add to this team.
team.descPending: These people have been invited to your team and have been sent an invitation email. They may join the team by accepting the email invitation.
team.teamMemberDesc: All of the people that are part of this team.
team.confirmLeave: Are you sure you would like to leave this team?
team.confirmRemove: Are you sure you would like to remove this person from the team?

admin.name: Administrator
admin.description: Administrator users can perform any action.

editor.name: Editor
editor.description: Editor users have the ability to read, create, and update.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions.
faq.details: See our FAQ for more details.
